title: Flu Vaccine Clinics
author: Government Websites by CivicPlus
cleaned_text: For 2022 San Juan County will be providing flu vaccine clinics for ALL children and uninsured or underinsured adults. Underinsured means that your insurance coverage will not cover the cost of the flu vaccine. If you have insurance that covers the cost of vaccine please contact your medical provider or pharmacy to receive your flu vaccine. You can also use the Washington State Department of Health vaccine finder tool to search for availability (including high dose flu vaccines)
